TopicTitle: Stock Crafts appearing with setting off

Articles.Content: I have the “Stock Crafts” setting with the light off, yet I have the stock making history ships, and it’s quite annoying.

The same for me, but the ones I have now are maybe new ships from the most recent update (on PS4)? Not completely sure about that. They will not go away in the VAB, but they don't show up if you select a ship from the launchpad. Yay, another work-around!
